entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 08:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -38.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -42.7°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
